verses.name: Job 38:28
verses.text: Hath the rain a father? or who hath begotten the drops of dew?

verses.name: Job 38:29
verses.text: Out of whose womb came the ice? and the hoary frost of heaven, who hath gendered it?

verses.name: Job 38:30
verses.text: The waters are hid as with a stone, and the face of the deep is frozen.

verses.name: Job 38:31
verses.text: Canst thou bind the sweet influences of Pleiades, or loose the bands of Orion?

verses.name: Job 38:32
verses.text: Canst thou bring forth Mazzaroth in his season? or canst thou guide Arcturus with his sons?

verses.name: Job 38:33
verses.text: Knowest thou the ordinances of heaven? canst thou set the dominion thereof in the earth?
